message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Let's meet in the middle, 55-45 is fair.
I can go a bit lower, but 58-42 is as low as I'm willing to go.
Getting desperate here, 52-48 is my final offer.
You said 52-48 was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. 57-43 is still a good deal for you considering the inflation.
